heading: Spiritborn Weekend Wrap-Up
content: After a fast and furious blitz of new information, we have put together a Spiritborn Weekend Wrap-Up. See below for all the latest updates regarding the class and expansion. very own content creators had a chance to play the this past Thursday. all had fun rumbling in the jungles of and kicking some demon butt in the process. Click the portraits below to see their VoDs from the event. In case you haven't seen it, we created a specific Vessel of Hatred section on the site. This allows us to get a jump on relaying important details as we learn about them for the Spiritborn and the expansion, too. Our writers did a great job incorporating all the new information for the class and new learnings about the changes to the game where appropriate. Are you a fierce werewolf? A master of the arcane arts? wants you! With the Vessel of Hatred expansion coming soon, the team wants to bolster its guide writing ranks. We are looking for: Other factors may be discussed. If you are interested, reach out to directly, via Discord. We are currently working hard on what updates are going to be done after the Developer Livestream for Season 5. In addition, the is laying down plans to cover the Vessel of Hatred expansion. A lot is being brainstormed with the rumored changes and we aim to meet the challenges coming our way. With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
